product.title: Cat Traps | Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Cat Traps
by Molly Coxe

When a very creative cat wants a snack, it decides to set a few traps. But the traps never seem to work exactly as the cat had planned—until its owner comes home. Cat Traps is a hilarious cause-and-effect book, brought to life with the engaging illustrations of Molly Coxe. The simple, repetitive text in Cat Traps makes it a great book for early readers to try on their own.

Tie-in Activity: What’s going to happen? As you read Cat Traps with your child, pause in the story and ask your child whether she thinks the cat’s trap will work. Look for clues in the art to see why it might not.
